sentences.en: Alaska still is a land of iceberg and polar bear.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加现在仍是冰山和北极熊的世界.

sentences.en: But this is only the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 然而,这仅仅是一种表面现象.

sentences.en: Have you ever seen an iceberg?
sentences.cn: 你曾经看见过冰山 吗 ?

sentences.en: I personally think we're seeing the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 我个人认为我们仅看到了冰山的一角.

sentences.en: Most of the iceberg is under the water.
sentences.cn: 冰山的大部分在水面以下.

sentences.en: Only the tip of an iceberg pokes up above water.
sentences.cn: 只有冰山的尖端突出于水面.

sentences.en: Over 100 burglaries are reported every month, and that's just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 每月报案的入室盗窃案超过百起, 而这只不过是冰山一角.

sentences.en: Suppose we're on a ship that hits an iceberg.
sentences.cn: 假设我们在一艘撞到冰山的船上.

sentences.en: The above complaints are, I suspect, just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 我想，以上的抱怨只是冰山一角。

sentences.en: The mighty iceberg came into view.
sentences.cn: 巨大的冰山出现在眼前.

sentences.en: The ship hit an iceberg and went under.
sentences.cn: 船撞上一座冰山而沉没了.

sentences.en: The Titanic took a severe blow from an iceberg before It'sank.
sentences.cn: 泰坦尼克重重地撞上冰山后沉没了.

sentences.en: Unless we're all a lot more careful, the people who have died so far will be just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 除非我们都加倍小心，否则死者的人数会比现在多得多。

sentences.en: You don't think I know that you're the tip of the iceberg?
sentences.cn: 你以为我不知道你是冰山的一角?

phrases.tran_cn: 冰山一角；事物的表面部分

trans.tran_en: a very large mass of ice floating in the sea, most of which is under the surface of the water
